markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fatal Aria](/Feats.aspx?ID=211) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 103 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion, potentially striking them dead on the spot. You learn the [_fatal aria_](/Spells.aspx?ID=383) composition spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Fatal Aria
